bow: to the young mother who thought her phone dropping in the car was so much more important than keeping her eyes on the road totaling my car with my year old and month old we were in car accident in june my babies and because young mother she had her month old in the backseat decided her phone dropping was more important than keeping her eyes on the road she knocked my car off the road totaling it my perfect year old little girl has been to hospitals specialists and was at one time thought to have brain tumor because her eyes just started wandering ct scans are heartbreaking especially when they had to give her enough propofol to knock out an elephant could pick up my babies for about week because of my back and neck injuries could you even imagine not being able to hold your babies because of physical pain caused by someone stupidity my husband lost so many work hours and could take pain pills because had to take care of the kids when he finally did go back to work it was agonizing when my back would spasm and shake from picking up my children my daughter eyes will never be the same from the trauma of taking the brunt of the impact her car hit my daughters door the eye specialist said she will have to do vision therapy glasses and eye patches all of that is hard to do with year old and very expensive to the grand total of 635 for pairs this is just rant as sometimes wan na break down and cry still but please please please always pay attention while driving yes no serious injuries happened but it is heart wrenching to know my baby may need surgery to fix her eyes down the road she used to be so outgoing before the accident now she refuses to potty train before she was going on the potty her talking is very minimal about 10 words for 25 month old and she is afraid to go to new places any dr appointment is break down just wanted to say that because of something as ridiculous as picking up phone while driving my eviee is no longer the same please pay attention to the road while driving everything else can wait really http imgur com ode6r jpg my heart breaks for you you are so strong wish you the best in the future and your daughter is absolutely beautiful am so glad nothing terribly serious happened hopefully this post makes people think lt thank you so much for your kind words it means lot really hope that people will read this and understand that something as simple as looking away for just minute while driving can not only impact your life but other lives as well it could ve been so much worse but right after impact to hear my babies start screaming my heart stopped got out of the car and screamed while was pulling off the door on my daughters side it just is memory time will heal children are such blessing every moment matters no matter how small and insignificant expecting my first so ca really understand fully but do have slight understanding of how that would feel my mother got into terrible car accident and she told me the same it traumatizing hope you and your children heal mentally physically and emotionally as fast as possible lt how heartbreaking hope you and your little ones heal but surely the other driver is liable for your costs keep telling dh not to text and drive one of these days it will catch up to him though he thinks it wo oh ericka you need to contact an attorney if you have already please thankfully my husband was police officer knows protocol happened to be driving the car we bought with his settlement as he was hit on duty by drunk driver and broke his chest it took him three years to get any money and he couldnt work as an officer after that we had just bought the car weeks before it was totaled his mother is paralegal and accidents are her specialty so we are ok in that area the healing process is hard they have me doing steroid shots in my back and had to do physical therapy for few months my daughter is seeing an eye specialist regularly it been hard summer refuse to use my phone and drive my boys are too too important hope she was punished somehow as she not only put her own baby life in her hands but another family also in addition hope her insurance is covering everything can not imagine how freaked out would of been or how livid thankfully she had good insurance but there were few things like her glasses we had to pay out of pocket because they were special glasses and were covered by insurance thank you so much and congratulations on your first children truly make your life better hate to be that person but you should be able to sue her for the damages to cover the cost of the medical related stuff like the glasses ditto purposefully put my phone where ca reach it so wo be tempted my husband hates not being able to get me because he only has the chance to say hi few times day no cell phones at work but he knows it because driving and ll email him when get out do know what makes her glasses special so do know if this will work for you or not but ve been buying my glasses from zenni optical can get pair with lenses for as little as 13 with shipping my husband and kids all wear glasses too and it has saved us hundreds zennioptical com deleted believe she had back injury as well was sure with the things like my daughter 630 glasses it was an immediate expense from our pocket it could wait for the settlement it infuriating that it was covered by any insurance either just with the time off my husband had to take and he still takes time off for my drs appointments all the money lost and the expense of purchasing new vehicle it is taking toll on our family it nice to talk about it because can only tell my husband so many times how upset am over the situation or when my daughter eyes randomly go off or when she covers her eyes anytime shes outside or in bright room because her eyes hurt have to turn my head and cry feel so upset at that lady sometimes and others wonder if there was something else couldve done it just been very difficult fully understand but just wanted to make sure you knew you may be able to get her to reimburse you if you get good lawyer they may be able to get the insurance company to pay ca agree with this enough was in an accident last year where pickup truck driver was paying attention he says his brakes went out but they tested fine at the scene crossed the center line and hit me head on my two year old was badly injured but she has emotional scars that break my heart but the worst thing is that my unborn baby later died one day before his due date ca tell you how devastating it was now ve been run into twice since then and really starting to lose faith in the capability of other drivers everyone needs to just pay attention to the road what beautiful little girl you sounds like an amazing mommy am sorry for your hurts and irresponsibility of others stay strong because she needs you to be your post hit home with me no more texting while driving so sorry for your loss its true shame that people ca wait minutes to reach for their phone music or whatever every time drive picture myself getting hit again my husband says that ll never change either it is absolutely heartbreaking to hear what happened to you and your family it is definitely an emotional process that hope time will heal but it is something that will be very hard for me to trust anymore thank you for listening the safety of yourself and others is whats important driving in general is big responsibility that everyone takes for granted these days glad my story was able to shine some light on how dangerous it is things can wait thank you omg this post made me tear up your daughter is so beautiful and can just imagine how precious she is to you we were hit in july by woman pulling out of parking lot and not paying attention we were lucky no one was seriously injured but both my son and my daughter had seat belt burns and was so angry every time would look at those marks on my kids and think careless person behind the wheel did that to them ca even begin to imagine your emotional state after going through all of that hope that you both fully heal and your daughter does have any future eye or vision problems my husband accident was very similar to your brothers he was hit by an man who was in the states illegally he was driving drunk and while he was throwing beer bottle in the back of his truck swerved and hit my husband head on my husband after the accident actually got out of his truck and started directing traffic when he realized he almost could breathe was when his fellow officers made him go to the hospital the truck the other man was driving was uninsured as well as his boss company as he was driving in company vehicle it took years to get his settlement it really ridiculous that people act so invincible behind the wheel it ridiculous and why are these drunk people still driving jeez the law should be that people are too scared of the repercussions then to get behind the wheel drunk imo and haha your husband sounds kinda awesome feel better know how much back pain sucks thank you so much so sorry you all were hit just another very sad situation that could ve been avoided completely glad no one was seriously hurt could imagine belt marks on my babies my husband taught me well on how to properly fasten their car seats and 100 believe that leaving seatbelt loose can make the accident deadly awareness of proper car seat installment how to securely fasten your child is life saver you sound like wonderful mother really am glad everyone was ok in your situation it so easy to get mad but when it comes to your children who better to get mad for my husband is kinda awesome he is marine went to war twice and suffered through few ieds and purple heart came back home to become police officer and has even saved little boy life he is true american hero very proud of him at the accident my husband ended up drilling the cop that was called to take reports haha yep my husband is my hero just told my boyfriend he is no longer allowed to text and drive if in the car with him ideally would prefer if he did do it at all but at least know that when in the car with him and our son he will not be texting at all will be taking his phone away from him thanks ericka feel for you and your babies too just hope that even one person will read this and think twice about texting or allowing other distractions impair their driving ability so very sorry ca imagine your feelings certainly hope the best for your family so sorry my 2nd sister in law was just as stupid as this idiot woman she turns all the way around while driving down the freeway to attend to her newborn and toddler flew off cliff and rolled the car many times no one was hurt the saddest part is no one sees what she did wrong they put all blame on the ambulance for separating her from the two kids just ca believe it she could have hurt or killed many many others you are an amazing strong and inspiring woman and mother am so sorry for your hardship am disgusted with the behavior see on the roads the helplessness must have been awful try to remember that you are not responsible for any of it also as recovery from tumor removal in my spine can empathize with you on how it tears out your heart not to be able to pick up your little loves when they reach up for you ve been through the ringer on back treatments before they knew about the tumor so pm if you ever want to talk about that or anything else no one understands your pain unless they ve been there it just not fathomable if could hug you and your precious little girl from here would good luck and here for you if you like can see how people would just think she was doing anything wrong but in an instance when the children are going crazy in the backseat and you are driving at high speeds just could imagine taking my eyes off the road my year old has thrown fits because would reach her toy on the floor have said many times kids mommy is driving and not going to put us in danger by not paying attention your toy can wait am shocked she would have been more careful with those babies in the car she was really lucky no one was seriously hurt it truly is common sense in that situation screaming babies for few minutes or risking major car accident you can beat yourself up for years reliving this you should have gone to the store first you should have taken different street maybe if you did hurry the toddler the lists go on and on and on know my own situation that leaves me without my son go over things that could have been different and if known what know now and emotionally matured and go back and do it over again the thousands of things would change but ca change them what done is done if my typically stubborn toddler would have understood what needed from him and if had my now counselor on my side and an attorney that actually gave shit things could have been much different and he still be mine do blame him or have bad feelings or thoughts about him there absolutely no reason too he was baby he did what he was going to do regardless love my son so much all can do is remind myself was in the wrong it was ever my intentions for his little life to get so fucked up ca change anything that happened what can do is live in the here and now and show him how much love him send cards and letters and packages all the time have visits year and will never miss second of my time with him as he gets older he going to ask questions why him why did his babyhood have to suck so damn bad sorry baby but that just life we do what we can with what we have so many people involved with us were reckless and ignorant and just plain assholes who did care about us the hate have for them the hate that burns red and wants to lash out will probably always be with me but ca let it control me ca stay stuck in years ago he needs me to be great mom even though not raising him he needs me to be mentally physically and emotionally healthy mom for him as he grows up you can get past the freshness of the hate and the unfairness you can live in today and appreciate what you have ve learned it true forgiveness is gift you give yourself it like drinking poison waiting for the other person to die it does make it right or ok what that woman did in no way does it make it right she needs to be punished and hopefully learn your kids and husband need you to be the mom you were before not quite as this is life changing event but try your best to not get sucked into the hate and shitty ness you re great mom and your kids and husband are lucky to have you so many kids are born into the worst situations your kids get love thank you for your sweet words honestly have felt so strong lately my daughter is delayed on things like the potty and her speech is very behind but work every day with her diligently making sure to enunciate everything say to her when her eyes wander always ask where are eviee eyes because have to get her to focus on me again and get sad all over again some days are worse than others today taught her how to ride her four wheeler and ended up in severe back pain from being bent over for time my back shakes really bad and it very sharp pain that shoots up to my neck which causes bad headaches my back problems seem so insignificant to yours could imagine having tumor removed and having children to think about on top of all of the other worries thank you for your support if you need anyone to talk to as well please throw it all out there know what its like as mother to keep everything together when things are falling apart and smile at the same time this post is helping me in so many ways by having people encourage and hear my hardships my doctor thought had throat cancer last month so had tonsillectomy weeks ago and they biopsied my tonsils thankfully no cancer but in the time it was to wait for the news was so difficult was living off of prayers and worrying about my children when tell my family members everything that has happened to us this summer their mouths drop open wow wish you lived here we need to hug it out so much of what you say sounds familiar my son has extremely severe food allergies and has spoken yet either friends blame his restricted diet but there nothing can do about it he is healthy but high risk just try to remember that these things come at their own pace it sounds like you are an amazing mom and encouraging her perfectly sure she ll blow you away with speech soon know not everyone could handle the craziness in our lives so pretty thankful that was the one blessed with this child blessed that after year and 18 doctors later they found the tumor in my spine blessed that my baby is going to be just turned 12 that did some bad damage to the functionality of my right eye did the eye patch and corrective glasses thing still have to wear glasses and it sucked at the time but it was definitely worth it kids are tough and she ll get through it just fine have no doubt of that so sorry this happened to you have been so filled with anger and sadness while reading reddit in long time hope that you are having to pay for this all yourself that bitch or her insurance better be doing it all omg so angry and sad that is very true every day on the news hear about some horrific child abuse case or negligence on the parents part one thing for sure is my husband and always put our children first and have the deepest love for them really hope your relationship with your son only gets better you will always have bond with your babies all you can do is love them heavy prescriptions are very expensive am legally blind without my glasses did everything could to get the cheapest deal possible and still paid over 400 my husband glasses usually run around 350 at regular stores but he managed to get his most recent pair for 65 with frames 55 for the lenses 10 for the frames online have much weaker prescription and it only runs me about 15 or so pair my mother is legally blind without glasses as well and also has found ordering her glasses online to be significantly cheaper than getting them locally they are as cheap as my glasses or even my husband but it is hundreds of dollars cheaper still the turn around time for them is about the same too since with prescription that strong they always have to be sent of to be made and it can take upwards of month really reccomend it it saves lot of money my moms husband was telling me about ordering them online as well thought for sure they would take my prescription so dreadfully sorry that this happened to you and your precious children this is terrible story you see ridiculously careless drivers every day most unfortunately but you at least think that mother with her child in the car would be paying the utmost attention the use of phones in cars should be rigorously banned and enforced each of those users selfishly thinks nup wo happen to me and do give shit about anyone but their selfish selves you sound very strong and focused thank you for sharing your story it might make people think twice or thrice before pulling out their phone while driving best wishes for everything working out for you all as quickly as possible xxx using phone whilst driving is not illegal where you live if not have you discussed this with your political representative me too this is the sort of story they should feature on those distracted driving commercials deleted using phone is illegal where live have still almost been hit or run off the road more times than can count since the law was passed they do distracted driving blitzes and every time see people posting warnings on facebook from their phones while driving it infuriating think they re now talking about people being able to report license plates now and the police will start sending out warnings not that actually think that will make any more of difference so sorry just do have words to express how much this angers me know too many people who just do take it seriously that focusing on their phone can and will lead to causing collisions have been almost run off the road by man on his cell phone when my daughter was just days old ve been almost hit more times than can count by people driving through intersections who did see the stop sign because they were on their phone all the laws against it and people still do think it big deal unfortunately it is it is legal to use your phone while driving in oklahoma thank you so much really hoping people make safe decisions behind the wheel you are truly inspiring thank you for giving me hope for the future not to look at it in dire way but way that my daughter can overcome many more things then ever could you sound like such strong person and am so thankful you shared your life story with me hope many more good things for you and your family the glasses are prescription they are the prism lenses that force your eyes to focus assumed they were so expensive because of her being toddler they had to do long fitting to make sure they wo fall off of her head and the frames were limited on ones that would fit they did show me whole lot of options all of them were costly but what can you do it was big expense but was 100 necessary wish that our insurance would ve covered the cost but it really is crazy how expensive they are once we get the settlement it will be better but ve racked up 10 000 bill on my back problems alone an mri specialists and physical therapy the ambulance ride alone was close to 000 we probably wo see the settlement money till some time next year unfortunately these things take time something that could ve been completely avoided if she had only paid attention ugh its so frustrating omgosh day old baby would ve been hysterical so glad everything was ok what scary situation people just are ignorant behind the wheel but it really can turn everything upside down wish more people would realize that it worth shot there are also multiple companies that do this so if one does work out another might ok so that makes bit more sense assuming you re in the us this country is about the only place could think of feeling that it reasonable to charge that kind of money for medically necessary products yes in oklahoma we had to see dr that specialized in children eye problems our doctor was the highest rated doctor in our area so we only wanted the best for our daughter plus when they mention the possibility to do surgery on her eyes only wanted the best was beyond furious at least he noticed what he had done and looked appropriately freaked out himself maybe it taught him to keep his attention on driving worse than that was when almost got hit crossing at lighted intersection woman was turning left and when there was gap in oncoming traffic she did even bother to check to make sure there were any pedestrians was step from being hit had my daughter on my back in carrier and was about months pregnant if been using the stroller my daughter may well have been killed if gotten to the intersection few seconds earlier would have been right in her path and it entirely possible that all three of us would have died she did even notice how close she came was shaking the rest of the day thinking of all the ways it may have ended in tragedy for me and my family it very expensive when you say her eyes wander do you mean like lazy eye had both of my eyes lazy one more so than the other had strabismus surgery to correct it when was three but it did take then got worse dealt with my very embarrassing humiliating lazy eyes until was 18 and got it corrected again so far it been good it has been three years actually going to try this if its pretty cheap its worth shot to see omg your story gave me chills how horrific and just absolutely negligent so glad you are all ok what an experience to go through with children and being pregnant she has intermittent extropia caused from head trauma it is not an easy process we are hoping the glasses patching and vision therapy might fix it surgery is really our last resort but my husband and have been diligent with working with her and making sure she wears her glasses being frequent pedestrian make me better driver never forget to double check for people crossing the street she ll pick it up soon it did take me long and was about her age poor baby girl my heart aches knowing that her life has been so severely affected by someone else gross negligence the mist important thing is that she alive so true know it could ve been so much worse my heart goes out to those that have suffered far worse than my situation could imagine losing any of my babies the thought is just unfathomable really feel for you and your family it seems like you have gone to many doctors and specialists for yourself amp children have you thought about massage therapy and chiropractic as well massage and chiropractic will help you which will help your babies because your daily pain level will be lower and may be cheaper than medication and doctors visits massage can help your little girl too help realign her little skeleton to where it supposed to be many kind thoughts your way really hope everything gets better for you thank you and know what you mean being angry really does accomplish anything did feel bad for the woman she was pretty shaken up gave her hug cause she looked like she was about to cry when she saw my kids in the backseat did get angry afterward but know it was mistake and she admitted to the officers that it was her fault totally understand it really just an unfortunate situation all around hope they can help her see better thank you very much the young mother who hit me was pretty shaken up as well she was crying the whole time my children and were being looked at by paramedics went over to make sure she was ok and gave her hug and told her that was glad no one was seriously hurt it could ve been fatal mistake but sure she learned to be more cautious while driving am so sorry to hear this maybe you can contact somebody who does cell phone driving ads and try to get them to do psa on it about texting and driving that will hit home with parents ve only seen couple of texting and driving commercials before and they are both very heartbreaking and in such violent way the thought makes me want to stay locked up in my house thank you am so excited have year old and one month old and am absolutely terrified of this happening to me will not only be more cautious while driving but will do my best not to look at my phone while driving as well so sorry please consider not talking on the phone either even hands free it is very distracting it increases accidents as much as driving while mildly intoxicated or while exhausted have read number of studies and worked in local news for several years in my state it was not illegal to phone and drive but anecdotally the driver at fault was chattering away on the cell phone in so many of the accidents we covered couple months ago in my city mother of two luckily her kids were in the car went out to run errands and was only few miles from home when she decided to text while driving she hit tree and died only look at my phone at red lights
